website_summaries.verdict: A well-imagined and simply elegant music box with storage for trinkets and keepsakes.
pros: Features a large bottom drawer and two smaller side drawers
Inside is a small mirror and a model depicting a monarch butterfly
The music from this attractive box plays for approximately 3.5 minutes
cons: Some components are delicate and easy to break

customer_reviews.title: She was like a pet
customer_reviews.text: I had a butterfly emerge from its chrysalis in December of 2017. I had brought it inside before it emerged because of the cold weather. The butterfly grew attached to me and refused to fly away. She flew in the house a little bit but always wanted to be in my hair or on my shoulder. She was like a pet. My little girl and I fell in love with her. When she died, I knew that she was very special and sent by God. So we purchased this beautiful box to keep her in. We absolutely love it! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Torie

customer_reviews.title: It was a Christmas morning HIT!!
customer_reviews.text: The art on the box is beautiful, the music plays nicely, and the special little drawers on the sides on the box are a hit with my daughter. She has been carrying this thing around since Christmas day, plays the music every night as she falls asleep, and loves just rearranging all of her jewelry in it a few times a day! And the box itself is sturdy enough that I don't have to worry about it being damaged if she drops it.
customer_reviews.author: Christi Foss

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: My little girl was wanting this jewelry box from Santa Claus. I purchased it put it in her stocking, Christmas morning came and she was so excited! She was using it later on in the day and the Butterfly popped off and I essentially had to hot glue gun it back on and it still kept coming off. Pretty disappointed little girl and I'm not too happy considering it was $30. In my opinion it is not worth the money and I would not recommend it because it is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Jewelry Box
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a birthday gift for soon to be 7 year old daughter. Package arrived right on time. The package of the actual product was dented on one corner but it did not cause too much cosmetic damage to the jewelry box itself. The butterfly is beautifully painted. There are drawers on all sides of the box, with the best part being the drawers don't fully pull out. The drawer stops right at the end. I like this because my youngest won't accidently pull out and dump the jewelry out. The butterfly design on the outside is very pretty. Not over the top gushing pink; which is what my daughter likes.
customer_reviews.author: Chronic Szczepanek

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: I bought this music box for my granddaughter on her birthday. She loved it. Unfortunately it is cheaply made. She wound it a few times and it broke. Really wish products made in Asia were made to last. She was very upset about it and cried. Do not buy this product if you want a functioning music box.
customer_reviews.author: ANNETTE

customer_reviews.title: Butterflies
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little jewelry box for a niece who loves butterflies. It is a welcome alternative to all the ballerinas who dance for little girls in such boxes. She loved it and just plays with it as a toy to see the butterfly and listen to the music. It is a lovely house for her treasures.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Enchanting butterfly music or jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable! My 7 year old niece was enchanted with it. It is not big enough to use for much more than jewelry, but the music box was a big hit with my niece and all of the adults.
customer_reviews.author: L. Covington

customer_reviews.title: The different sized drawers and musical butterfly were a wonderful surprise for her
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 3 year old daughter and she loves it. The different sized drawers and musical butterfly were a wonderful surprise for her. She loves to store her Shopkins in the side drawers. The quality of the box is outstanding. My daughter is pretty rough on her toys and so far this box has survived.
customer_reviews.author: Almeda K. Harper

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a little girls birthday. She raises butterflies and she loved it. I also put a nice butterfly necklace in it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift and better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful box and better than I expected! I had low expectations from some reviews but i was pleasantly surprised! It may not last forever but things typically do not with children. I bought this for a 2 1/2 yr old girl who has a 3 yr old sister who also received another version of this box. They love stashing their treasures!
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Toys that have an element of surprise are the latest craze. The music is lovely. The drawers can be filled by their own treasures or like me, I will give a memorable gift on each special occasion.
customer_reviews.author: WCJB

customer_reviews.title: Different music box
customer_reviews.text: Very cute music box. I wanted something other than a stupid ballerina and this is lovely. It has little drawers for all of her/his secret treasures. Plays Isle of Capri, a rather odd choice of tune but what do kids know. The monarch butterfly spins to the music.
customer_reviews.author: G. Reuss

customer_reviews.title: A hit with my daughter
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute music box. They don't make them out of wood like they used to but it's made well nevertheless. It was my 6 year old daughter's favorite Christmas present (and she got some fun stuff!). She played with it so much the first week that I was hearing the song in my dreams and had to promise myself that I was not going to get tired of hearing it over and over. Very pretty music and design, would recommend for anyone's little girl!
customer_reviews.author: pkwitt

customer_reviews.title: Music Box for Boys
customer_reviews.text: Toddler boy was enamored by his sister's ballerina music box, but she didn't want him to play with it. So, I got him this one. With it being green (not pink) and having butterflies (not tutus) on it it is more suitable for him. And, he loves all the drawers in it. He stores various small items in it and it works as his treasure chest when playing pirates. Now, his sister wants one too as her original one doesn't have all the drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: It was okay
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't as well made as I'd expected, basically cardboard. My 6 y/o granddaughter loved the design so I guess it's good enough for a first jewelry box but I wouldn't buy it for anyone older,
customer_reviews.author: Russell Rector

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Picture doesn't do justice my daughter is in love it's so pretty
customer_reviews.author: Kyleigh Black

customer_reviews.title: Music box
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift! It's not a toy or educational item however, it's a treasure. My husband and I truly enjoyed playing the music and marveling at the detail and repetition of the pattern design on the box. The secret compartments were novel. We plan to give this to our only grandaughter (4) at Christmas. Then we'll give her jewelry. Terrific music box! Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: but very nice for my 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected, but very nice for my 3 year old. I love the butterfly inside the box. Very cute little jewelry box.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: nice jewelry box for girl
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a 10 year old girl. I wanted a jewelry box that didn't have a ballerina as the rotating figure. The butterfly and music is very pretty. The actual storage in the jewelry box is smaller than I imagined, but I still thought it was age appropriate. The post of butterfly figure needed to be adjusted when it arrived because it was rubbing on the jewelry box, causing the figure to stop. I just need to realign it and it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Boys love these things too
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son's 5th birthday. Boys love these things too. He loves to go through my jewelry box so we found this one. We love butterflies and this one connects well to a science/nature theme. We love this beautiful monarch music box.
customer_reviews.author: forester

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this music box and was intrigued with all the little drawers. She also liked being able to make the butterfly "dance to the music." It was well constructed and very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: stillwaters

customer_reviews.title: I think it freaks her out like it's a bug
customer_reviews.text: My 10 yr old Granddaughter is not fond of the butterfly that's on the inside. I think it freaks her out like it's a bug.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Olby

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This box is so pretty and has lots of tiny drawers to store little treasures. I would have loved this when I was a girl. I bought it for my Goddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Breann

customer_reviews.title: Nice to find one that didn't have a ballerina
customer_reviews.text: Nice to find one that didn't have a ballerina. The paper "frame" around the mirror kept coming unstuck, so I had to glue it. The music box is a little "sticky" when it gets near the end of a wind-up, but overall great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Summers

customer_reviews.title: Cute box, perfect for any butterfly lover
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute box! I got this for my son's 6th Birthday because he love Monarch butterflies. He really loves it. Very nice quality and love all of the compartments for his treasures! Recommend for a butterfly lover gift!
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely adorable and littler drawers on each side, you can't tell that from the picture
customer_reviews.author: dmarie

customer_reviews.title: its a nice box, but when i got the package the ...
customer_reviews.text: Its okay. its a nice box, but when i got the package the box was all ripped up and it looked like someone was trying to open it before it even got to me. i bought it for my god niece and I'm sure shes going to love it, but the thought of someone doing anything to the box before i got it terrifies me. the box it came in was opened ripped the paper was off. so far as i can see the actual product looks fine
customer_reviews.author: hachiesce mccleary

customer_reviews.title: and I have to say it's much better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I just received this, and I have to say it's much better than I expected. Very well made, and the music is beautiful, Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Linann

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Delicate
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my almost 7 granddaughter for safe keeping of her pierced earrings and other keepsakes. Very pretty -- decoupage type box with lots of boxes all around. Music box works well...pretty butterfly may not last...very delicate. But she loves it so far.
customer_reviews.author: LBird

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My butterfly loving daughter thinks this is great! Super cute, pretty song, and tons of little places for jewelry... Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: AndiG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This box is absolutely gorgeous! I bought it for my mom for Mother's Day, and she LOVED it! It looks better in person than in the picture. There is a long drawer on the back, and another small drawer on the other side.
customer_reviews.author: E. Dunston

customer_reviews.title: The favorite gift received by our 5 Yr old niece at Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Of all the Christmas gifts she received, this particular music box became the favorite gift our niece received that day. For that matter, it was the only gift she insisted on carrying home from Grandma's; the others could stay and wait for her return. Need anymore be said?
customer_reviews.author: Doberman_Fan

customer_reviews.title: Such a sweet gift to give to little girls
customer_reviews.text: Such a sweet gift to give to little girls. Big fan and the two little girls I gave it to for Christmas both were just giddy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L. Strang

customer_reviews.title: Very fun and cute
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to a 2 year old for a birthday gift. She loved seeing that butterfly appear. The box seems to be still working for as many times as it has been opened and closed by a two year old. All wood box, I believe.
customer_reviews.author: Saluces

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect Christmas gift for my granddaughter :)
customer_reviews.author: Dianne De Pasquale

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: SO sweet with all the little drawers for tiny treasures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Monarch butterfly music box
customer_reviews.text: Music box arrived perfectly, on time, and well packed. Very well received, and made a little girl very happy for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: K. M. Hegg

customer_reviews.title: she LOVED it! This gift was so special and so ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading Amazon reviews, I purchased this for my 6 year old granddaughter....she LOVED it! This gift was so special and so loved!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: If you are into butterflies...
customer_reviews.text: this is a very cute little starter jewlery box for a little girl. Lots of hidden compartments to put her special little findings. Pretty butterfly instead of the typical ballerina...thus no body image problems for the future hopefully. We'll tackle Barbie next time.
customer_reviews.author: TrueSouthernBelle

customer_reviews.title: My Granddaughter loved this music box with all the little drawers and ...
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter loved this music box with all the little drawers and the butterfly. We are celebrating the year of the butterfly, with the Granddaughter. Everything is about the butterflies. So this was a nice gift for a special little girl.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara  Arnold

customer_reviews.title: It's cute but way too small. The top section ...
customer_reviews.text: It's cute but way too small. The top section of the box isn't even big enough to hold bangle bracelets for a 7 year old. The small drawers are also ineffective.
customer_reviews.author: C. W.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter for her 4th birthday. She loves it. I checked it out before I sent it to her....appeared to be well made and was beautiful. No regrets with this purchase at all.
customer_reviews.author: sweetfreedomgirl

customer_reviews.title: Long playing.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 3 yo. Her sister got the horse one for her birthday and she wanted a music box also. We wind this at least twice every night. Have had it for about 8 months and still going strong. We love our "butterfly song"
customer_reviews.author: Armywife1109

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful music box
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful music box. I bought it for my friend who loves butterflies and she was delighted
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Butterfly Jewelry Box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my 8 yr. old niece & she loves it. It is built very well & more attractive than the picture shows. I wanted to put some sort of little items in the drawers for her to find, not necessarily jewelry. I found an assortment of tiny colorful frogs at the local Dollar Store & placed them in each drawer. It was an added delight to watch her find them in each drawer. I am very happy with this item & the seller. Delivery was prompt & the jewelry box was in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: tess550

customer_reviews.title: Unique and well made
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry box is so unique. I love the little drawers and butterfly motif. It is so not like the standard pink box with the spinning ballerina that you typically see for little girls.
customer_reviews.author: Kutie

customer_reviews.title: Monarchs Music Box for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was delighted with the box, mainly because of the butterflies and the music. However, I was disappointed with the size of the drawers. There is not much that can be put in them. The designs on the box are lovely and my granddaughter is happy with it. With the construction of the box, I'm not sure how long it will last but she's happy now. All in all for a 6 year old, the box is fine. I'm happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn Loschiavo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful box
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful box that is very solid and sturdy. It is much heavier than I expected. I believe it will stand up to my daughter's play. The drawers are fun. They are too small to be very practical, but they will store some of her "treasures."
customer_reviews.author: Schindler's Knits

customer_reviews.title: Very nice little music box and birthday gift.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for a 10 year old girl. She really liked it and the butterfly on top was delicate and pretty. A nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: petal522

customer_reviews.title: refreshing theme
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fact that this box has a butterfly theme instead of the usual pink ballerina. My daughter likes the music, the butterfly, and the fact that is has the odd little drawers to hide her treasures in. The only thing I didn't like was that the large drawer in the front was stuck shut, and it took some careful work with a credit card to open it. Now it just has to be done slowly with a little jiggling to get it to slide out.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made with too small compartments for my young daughters jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: cierra n decrans

customer_reviews.title: Cute music box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a little graduation gift to myself, and I have to say, I'm very pleased with my decision. I never had a music box as a child, and this did not disappoint. The only thing I don't like about it is the fact that the drawers are almost too small to be useful (though I guess that's to be expected, since it is meant for children), and that the spinning butterfly would sometimes get stuck. Other than that, I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: So sweet
customer_reviews.text: This box is just so sweet, my daughter loves the little tiny side drawers, with the front and back drawer and top compartment there is a special place for all a little girls special treasures. She winds it up and listens to it every night before bed.
customer_reviews.author: K8

customer_reviews.title: Cool jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: This was a special retirement gift for my daughter's first grade teacher. She was a very hands on teacher and when the class studied insects, my daughter and I supplied the monarch butterfly caterpillars and leaves, so this jewelry box was the perfect gift. Besides the twirling butterfly, it has lots of little secret drawers both front and back. The teacher loved it and I've bought a second one to give to my daughter for her birthday. I know when they play their music boxes and see the butterflies twirl, they'll think of each other for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L. Kwan

customer_reviews.title: music box
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my granddaughter who is turning five. It is very cute. It has 5 compartments, some very small, maybe for rings. I think she will like it because she loves nature.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tough
customer_reviews.text: I bought this years ago for my toddler and she's in second grade now. And yes, the thing still works.
customer_reviews.author: TL8

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift for 7-year-old
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my niece, and she absolutely loved it. A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Keessen

customer_reviews.title: Child's Jewelry Box
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter was so excited to get this jewelry box for Christmas. Besides the large area for jewelry, he little drawers on back and side were fascinating to her.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Cole

customer_reviews.title: My daughter love catching butterflies and this music box reminds her and ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love catching butterflies and this music box reminds her and I of summer all year long! Just want my daughter had hoped for!
customer_reviews.author: Elisha

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful little box but it is not the biggest box
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful little box but it is not the biggest box. It will hold dainty little girls jewelry which is what it is made for. Just not a lot of room for any chunky jewelry but overall it is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy V

customer_reviews.title: ... I did my research on Amazon I was so HAPPY to find

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for nine year old girl
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this butterfly treasure box as a gift for a nine year old girl. It arrived in mint condition and it was beautiful. My neice really loved it and said it was her favorite present this year.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 8 year old girl!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for my 8 year olds jewelry. My 8 year old likes the different spots you can hide stuff and the music. Good box for a little girl.

customer_reviews.title: Very CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! This is a very cute little jewelry box with many different compartments. The design and butterfly are so pretty and colorful. Perfect gift for a 5-10 year old. It feels and looks like it is good quality too.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Music Box
customer_reviews.text: Truly beautiful. We gave it as a gift and the little girl loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for childs first box
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty design and certainly adequate for a young child's first box. My one criticism is the construction is a little delicate.

customer_reviews.text: Packaged well. My 10yr. old granddaughter will love it. This has a private little compartment for her secret things.

customer_reviews.title: nice gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this music box as a request from my 4 year old girl.. she likes it a lot but she is still young and likes the music and the idea more than the functional use.

customer_reviews.title: my lo just turned 3 and she loves it!
customer_reviews.text: my lo just turned 3 and she loves it! She loves butterflies so this was just perfect, and it is a 'starter' box for her to start her own collection of jewlrey! :)

customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it. Nice alternative to ballerina jewelry box for a nature lover.

customer_reviews.text: Beautiful little box. My young niece really likes it and I'm glad I could find a music box without a ballerina.

customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my granddaughters. They love them. I made a sticker with each of their names to put on them.

customer_reviews.title: Great music box for boys and girls!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 4 year old Grandson, he and his twin sister Loved it.....We had gotten her one with Ballrinas on it and after seeing his she wanted it..We were told that he kept kissing the butterfly. Their mother said it was georgous....we are very happy with our purchase and would recommend it to anyone..

customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift & have yet to see it, but the reports are that it is cute & it works.

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter, who said she liked it quite a bit. She said she liked all the drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Jewelry Music Box
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my three-year-old grandaughter for Christmas and put several pieces of jewelry in each drawer. She loved discovering the different spots where each drawer was located (front, both sides and back) and was fascinated by the circling butterfly with music when the top was lifted. This is a great, fun, gift for a child with the ability to be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Bobro

customer_reviews.title: great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this toy for my niece and she loved it! She opened it and the look on her face was priceless. She loved the detail, the drawers, and the song that played. Thanks!

customer_reviews.title: butterfly jewelry box
customer_reviews.text: My cousin loves it just need some jewelry to place in it now lol

customer_reviews.title: Very cute music box- well made
customer_reviews.text: This music box surprised me- for the price (I think it was under $25) it looks very well made and it's quite pretty.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy box with plenty of room for my granddaughter's special ...
customer_reviews.text: A pleasant surprise! Sturdy box with plenty of room for my granddaughter's special items. The design is beautiful and cleverly hides the drawer openings.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Berryman

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: bottom and side drawers stick and are very difficult to pull out but it's a cute, inexpensive jewelry box for a little girl
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Draper

customer_reviews.title: Treasure box perfect for any girl
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 4 year old niece. I've not seen it myself, but I hear she loves it. She loves taking her treasures in and out of it. Wonderful gift for any little girl.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved this gift for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this gift for Christmas. It's beautiful and timeless and I can tell will be treasured for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: M. Woods

customer_reviews.title: Music box
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my Granddaughter who is 15 . I thought it was smaller than I expected beings i didn't see any dimensions on the item I was surprised at how small it was

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this jewelry box, I was looking for one for my grand daughter that had a butterfly, and at only 1yr old she just love's to watch the butterfly twirl and listen to the music, the look on her face was priceless.

customer_reviews.title: Divinas
customer_reviews.text: I sent to my grand daughters and they loved...next year we are triying to go to Mexico and see the Monarca butterflies

customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my granddaughter and it's absolutely beautiful great quality

product_meta.title: Enchantmints Monarchs Butterfly Music Jewelry Box
product_meta.description:
Decorated with lovely Monarch butterfly artwork, this musical treasure box is perfect for the nature lover in your life! Box has a hinged top with interior mirror, inside compartment, twirling Monarch butterfly figurine, and a lovely velvet-flocked paper lining. Earrings, bracelets, charms and sachets are all safe and comfortable inside any of the four drawers: one on the front, one on the back, and two on the sides. Wind it up to hear it play “Cooley’s Reel.”

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Enchantmints’ mission is to create imaginative designs that provide joy for children and parents alike. Combining beautiful artwork in lovely washes of color with beloved musical tunes, each piece is an artistic treat for the eyes and ears! Designed to be cherished for years to come, musical treasure boxes are just right for keeping life’s treasures and precious mementos.
feature_bullets: Large bottom drawer and two tiny side drawers hold jewelry and other treasures.
Music box plays "Isle of Capri" with a twirling butterfly figurine
Part of the Enchantments Birds and Butterflies Collection.
Mirror on inside of top lid
